      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")


#macro (radioline $label $name $labels $values $sep)
  #set( $value = "" )
  #set( $value = $data.get($name) )
  #set($i=0)
  <tr><td valign='top'>
  #if ( $error.get($name) == "NullOrEmpty" )
    <font color='#ff0000;'>
    #else
    <font>
  #end
    $label
    </font>
</td><td valign='top'>
  #set($i=0)
  #foreach ($v in $values) 
    <input type='radio' name='$name' value ='$v'#if("$v"=="$value") checked='checked'#end >
    $labels.get($i) $!sep
    #set($i=1+$i)
  #end
</td></tr>
#end

<h1>Demographics 3/4</h1>

<table>

#radioline( "Are you a vegetarian?" "vegi" ["Yes","No"]  [1,0])

<tr><td valign='top'>
#if ( $error.height )
<font color='#ff0000;'>
#else
<font>
#end
How tall are you, in centimetres?
</font>
</td>
<td><input type='text' name='height' value ='$!data.height'></td></tr>


<tr><td valign='top'>
#if ( $error.weight )
<font color='#ff0000;'>
#else
<font>
#end
How much do you weigh in light clothing, in kilograms?
</font>
</td>
<td><input type='text' name='weight' value ='$!data.weight'></td></tr>

#radioline( "Do you regularly smoke any tobacco product, such as cigarettes, cigars, or pipes?" "smoke" ["Yes, daily","Yes, but not every day","No, not at all"]  [2,1,0])

<tr><td valign='top'>
#if ( $error.alcohol )
<font color='#ff0000;'>
#else
<font>
#end
When you drink alcohol, on average, how many drinks do you have?
</font>
</td>
<td><input type='text' name='alcohol' value ='$!data.alcohol'></td></tr>

#radioline( "Are you taking a prescribed medication? " "medication" ["Yes","No"]  [1,0])

#radioline( "Have you had any symptoms of or complaints about depression during the last month (30 days)?" "depression" ["Yes","No"]  [1,0])

#radioline( "Which hand do you write with?" "lefthand" ["left","right"]  [1,2])

<tr><td></td></tr>

#radioline( "What is your opinion of the following statement:  <br>'Good luck charms sometimes do bring good luck.'"  "luckyans" ["Definately not true","Probably not true","Don't know, maybe","Probably true","Definately true"]  [1,2,3,4,5] "<br>")

#radioline( "Do you have a lucky charm?" "haslucky" ["Yes","No"]  [1,0])

<tr><td></td></tr>

#radioline( "Many people think there is someone watching out for them to make sure things go well.  This someone <br> cannot be directly seen. Is there someone, who cannot be seen by others, watching over you?" "watchover" ["Yes","No"]  [1,0])

#radioline( "Apart from weddings, funerals and christenings, how often do you attend religious services these days?" "relig" ["More than once a week","Once a week","Once a month","Once a year","Less often than once a year","Never"]  [1,2,3,4,5,6] "<br>")

</table>
